title: Rear Master Cylinder - Inspection

body.body: Visually inspect the master cylinder bore for wear, scratches or corrosion. Replace as necessary.
Check the piston and cylinder bore for damage, wear or deterioration. Replace as necessary.
Always renew the piston and seal set if the cylinder is dismantled.
Examine the push rod for bends and damage. Replace as necessary.
